keyMoments.title: Rock Introduced as Yeti Cool Brothers Member
keyMoments.description: Rock is introduced as one half of the Yeti Cool Brothers, a pair of assassins hired by Caesar Clown to eliminate the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a new antagonist for the Punk Hazard arc.

reveals.information: Professional assassin working for Caesar Clown

keyMoments.title: Scotch Introduced as Yeti Cool Brothers Member
keyMoments.description: Scotch is introduced as one half of the Yeti Cool Brothers, a pair of assassins hired by Caesar Clown to eliminate the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a new antagonist for the Punk Hazard arc.

reveals.information: Professional assassin working for Caesar Clown

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Chopper Discovers NHC10 Drug Addiction
keyMoments.description: Chopper diagnoses that the children have been deliberately addicted to the stimulant drug NHC10 through candy, revealing the true horror of Caesar's experiments.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Chopper's medical expertise and moral character as a doctor.
keyMoments.quote: They've been given NHC10, a powerful stimulant. The use of which is tightly restricted throughout the world due to the danger it comes with!

keyMoments.title: Chopper's Fury at Caesar's Inhumanity
keyMoments.description: Chopper expresses righteous anger at the Master's crimes and vows to save the children and return them to their parents.
keyMoments.significance: Character-defining moment showing Chopper's compassion and dedication to helping those in need.
keyMoments.quote: We have to save these children and return them to their parents! I won't forgive the Master for this!

keyMoments.title: Chopper Refuses to Give Children the Drug
keyMoments.description: Despite their suffering, Chopper refuses to enable the children's addiction by providing the drug candy.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's medical ethics and willingness to make difficult decisions for long-term benefit.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Uses Bakusui Boshi
keyMoments.description: Usopp debuts his Bakusui Boshi (Sleeping Star) technique, using sleeping gas to peacefully sedate the attacking children.
keyMoments.significance: First use of this non-lethal technique that provides a compassionate solution to the crisis.

abilities.description: Usopp shoots a pellet which releases a powerful sleeping gas to non-lethally incapacitate targets.

name.japanese: トラファルガー・ロー

keyMoments.title: Law Gives Smoker's Heart to Caesar
keyMoments.description: Law hands over Vice Admiral Smoker's heart to Caesar Clown, despite showing visible displeasure at the action.
keyMoments.significance: Major strategic move that demonstrates Law's commitment to his alliance with Caesar while hinting at inner conflict.

keyMoments.title: Caesar's Drug Addiction Scheme Exposed
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that Caesar deliberately addicted the kidnapped children to NHC10 to keep them imprisoned at his facility.
keyMoments.significance: Exposes Caesar as one of the most morally reprehensible villains in the series through his exploitation of children.

keyMoments.title: Caesar Receives Smoker's Heart
keyMoments.description: Caesar receives Smoker's heart from Law, gaining leverage over the Marine Vice Admiral.
keyMoments.significance: Gives Caesar control over a powerful Marine officer.

keyMoments.title: Caesar Dispatches Yeti Cool Brothers
keyMoments.description: Caesar sends the Yeti Cool Brothers to eliminate the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the conflict by deploying deadly assassins.
keyMoments.quote: Yeti Cool Brothers, eliminate the Straw Hats!

keyMoments.title: Sind Reveals They Were Normal Sized
keyMoments.description: Sind reveals that none of the children were giants - they were all normal sized when they arrived on the island.
keyMoments.significance: Exposes the truth about Caesar's gigantification experiments.
keyMoments.quote: None of us were giants. We were all normal size when we first came to the island.

keyMoments.title: Sind Suffers Withdrawal Symptoms
keyMoments.description: Sind is one of the first children to show severe withdrawal symptoms, begging desperately for candy.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the horror of the children's addiction.

keyMoments.title: Mocha Suffers Withdrawal
keyMoments.description: Mocha experiences severe withdrawal symptoms from NHC10 addiction.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the children's suffering under Caesar's experiments.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Found Unconscious in Snow
keyMoments.description: Zoro is discovered unconscious in the snow, having been defeated by the Yeti Cool Brothers.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Yeti Cool Brothers as a serious threat.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Found Unconscious in Snow
keyMoments.description: Sanji is discovered unconscious in the snow, having been defeated by the Yeti Cool Brothers.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Yeti Cool Brothers as a serious threat.

keyMoments.title: Brook Found Unconscious in Snow
keyMoments.description: Brook is discovered unconscious in the snow, having been defeated by the Yeti Cool Brothers.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Yeti Cool Brothers as a serious threat.
